      public Path httpCopy​(URI uri, Path file, CopyOption... options)
      Copy all content from a uri to a target file.

      uri - the request URI of the remote source file
      file - the path to the local target file

      Parameters:
      uri - the uri to read
      Returns:

    • loadModule

      public void loadModule​(ExternalModules externals, ModuleLookup lookup, String module)
      Load a module.
      Parameters:
      externals - the module finder to query for already loaded modules
      lookup - the function that maps a module name to its uri
      module - the name of the module to load

    • loadMissingModules

      public void loadMissingModules​(ExternalModules externals, ModuleLookup lookup)
      Load all missing modules of the given module directory.
      Parameters:
      externals - the module finder to query for already loaded modules
      lookup - the searcher to query for linked modules
